text: Glenn Hackney (December 22, 1924 - May 20, 2022) was an American Republican politician. He was a member of the Alaska House of Representatives from 1973 to 1977 and the Alaska Senate from 1977 to 1981.Glenn Hackney leaves a legacy of service to Fairbanks Hackney was killed in a car crash in Fairbanks, Alaska on May 20, 2022 at the age of 97.Glenn Hackney, friend to the needy, former legislator, community volunteer has passed ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Road accident deaths in the United States Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Anchorage, Alaska
title: Glenn Hackney
